rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with Scandinavian minimalism and natural light from large windows. Incorporates Vastu by aligning the entrance in the east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space with comfortable seating and a focal fireplace. Large windows ensure plenty of natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian kitchen with functional layout and ample storage. Incorporates energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for a seamless flow, featuring light furniture and ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet study corner with built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating, designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and a touch of Vastu by positioning towards the northeast for prosperity.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Compact but well-equipped gym space featuring essential workout equipment and mirrors for space enhancement. Placed in a location that promotes positive energy flow.
